p: Methods: Single-center prospective and observational study between June and December of 2014. All patients staying in ICU for more than 8 days were collected. Data on demographics, clinical characteristics, the total amount of fluids administered and excreted, blood creatinine and urea, the need and dose of vasopressors, PaO2, FiO2, MAP were collected regarding the first 8 days in the ICU. SPSS was used for statistical analysis.
